definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) That which stanches or checks a flow .

subdefinitions.definition: ( specifically , archaic ) A plant or substance which stops the flow of blood ; a styptic .

definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) An act of stanching or stopping .
( mining ) Synonym of afterdamp ( “ suffocating gases present in a coal mine after an explosion caused by firedamp ” ) .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) That which stanches or checks a flow .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) An act of stanching or stopping .
( mining ) Synonym of afterdamp ( “ suffocating gases present in a coal mine after an explosion caused by firedamp ” ) .

definitions.definition: Alternative spelling of stanch ( “ a floodgate by which water is accumulated , for floating a boat over a shallow part of a stream by its release ; also, a dam or lock in a river ” ) .

main_definition: Alternative spelling of stanch ( “ a floodgate by which water is accumulated , for floating a boat over a shallow part of a stream by its release ; also, a dam or lock in a river ” ) .
